long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-onsi-ginkgo for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.fc20
golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.el6
golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.fc21
golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.fc22 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 22. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.fc22

Package golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.el6: * should fix your issue, * was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository, * should be available at your local mirror within two days. Update it with: # su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.el6' as soon as you are able to. Please go to the following url: https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-5954/golang-github-onsi-ginkgo-1.1.0-1.el6 then log in and leave karma (feedback).
